ghostPost.title: Blockchain information powerhouse BTC Media and Particl join forces
ghostPost.plaintext:
This is just the beginning!
Particl Foundation is proud to partner with BTC Studios- a division of BTC Media
[https://btcmedia.org], to help foster awareness on decentralized marketplaces,
individual sovereignty, right to privacy and self-governing, crypto-agnostic
platforms.

There is so much more to Particl than our PART token. Sure we’ve taken the best
Bitcoin offers and made it more private with Confidential Transactions and
RingCT. It’s true being the first token with SegWit native at launch makes all 
transactions on the Particl blockchain Segregated Witness transactions. However,
these essential privacy enhancements are only one piece of the puzzle Particl
has it’s sights set on solving. But that stuff most of you already know…

The problem is not many users outside our growing community know about Particl
and the innovative work the development team has delivered and is planning to
deliver over the next 6 months. That’s where BTC Studios comes in and we’re so
excited to begin!

BTC Media
> BTC Media’s team has over 60 years of combined publishing experience. We publish
the world’s only print magazines about the Bitcoin and blockchain industries,
and operate several of the most recognized and trusted online resources,
reaching millions of readers worldwide. Our unique insight into this world is
why leading companies, such as Nasdaq, rely on us to power their blockchain
content.
Brands:
Distributed [https://godistributed.com/]
The weekly blockchain technology report covering enterprise-level blockchain
applications: financial services, global… [https://godistributed.com/]
godistributed.com [https://godistributed.com/]

Bitcoin Magazine - Bitcoin, Blockchain, and Ethereum News, Prices, Charts &
Analysis [https://bitcoinmagazine.com/]
Founded in 2011, Bitcoin Magazine is the oldest and most trusted source of
news,
insight, reviews, guides, and price… [https://bitcoinmagazine.com/]
bitcoinmagazine.com [https://bitcoinmagazine.com/]

yBitcoin.com / Introducing the Future of Money [https://ybitcoin.com/]
Bitcoin is the perfect currency and payment system for our digital age. It is
decentralized, open source, and highly… [https://ybitcoin.com/]ybitcoin.com
[https://ybitcoin.com/]

Home | Lets Talk Bitcoin [https://letstalkbitcoin.com/]
The LTB Network provides a tokenized platform for podcasts, articles, and
forums
about the ideas, people, and projects… [https://letstalkbitcoin.com/]
letstalkbitcoin.com [https://letstalkbitcoin.com/]

Devsub | Dive Deep into Blockchain Development [http://devsub.io/]
Deep Dive into Blockchain Development [http://devsub.io/]devsub.io
[http://devsub.io/]

Thank you,

Particl Team
ghostPost.html:
This is just the beginning!

Particl Foundation is proud to partner with BTC Studios- a division of BTC Media, to help foster awareness on decentralized marketplaces, individual sovereignty, right to privacy and self-governing, crypto-agnostic platforms.

There is so much more to Particl than our PART token. Sure we’ve taken the best Bitcoin offers and made it more private with Confidential Transactions and RingCT. It’s true being the first token with SegWit native at launch makes all transactions on the Particl blockchain Segregated Witness transactions. However, these essential privacy enhancements are only one piece of the puzzle Particl has it’s sights set on solving. But that stuff most of you already know…

The problem is not many users outside our growing community know about Particl and the innovative work the development team has delivered and is planning to deliver over the next 6 months. That’s where BTC Studios comes in and we’re so excited to begin!

BTC Media

BTC Media’s team has over 60 years of combined publishing experience. We publish the world’s only print magazines about the Bitcoin and blockchain industries, and operate several of the most recognized and trusted online resources, reaching millions of readers worldwide. Our unique insight into this world is why leading companies, such as Nasdaq, rely on us to power their blockchain content.

Brands:

Distributed
The weekly blockchain technology report covering enterprise-level blockchain applications: financial services, global…godistributed.com

Bitcoin Magazine - Bitcoin, Blockchain, and Ethereum News, Prices, Charts & Analysis
Founded in 2011, Bitcoin Magazine is the oldest and most trusted source of news, insight, reviews, guides, and price…bitcoinmagazine.com

yBitcoin.com / Introducing the Future of Money
Bitcoin is the perfect currency and payment system for our digital age. It is decentralized, open source, and highly…ybitcoin.com

Home | Lets Talk Bitcoin
The LTB Network provides a tokenized platform for podcasts, articles, and forums about the ideas, people, and projects…letstalkbitcoin.com

Devsub | Dive Deep into Blockchain Development
Deep Dive into Blockchain Developmentdevsub.io

Thank you,

Particl Team

prev.title: 4th manual distribution of PART is complete.
prev.plaintext:
Overfunders & Group 1 Claimants
Wednesday’s PART disbursement went out yesterday. Thank you for completing the
wallet set up, enjoy staking those tokens!

Still waiting for your PART?
Please read Post launch update: July 24th, 2017
[https://particl.news/post-launch-update-july-24th-2017-419f55ddc89f] to see the
groups we’ve identified and the steps you need to take to secure your PART
token.

? Our next manual distribution will be Wednesday, August 23rd. Don’t wait any
longer, set up your wallet
[https://particl.news/guide-how-to-generate-your-particl-exchange-passphrase-1fd78ba36fd1] 
and get your tokens!

PART tokens not showing up in your wallet?
The best assistance you can get is from the Particl Community members in our
#help slack channel. I would encourage you to signup [http://slack.particl.io/] 
and we will get you straightened away faster than you can track a bitcoin
across
the blockchain [http://blog.wizsec.jp/2017/07/breaking-open-mtgox-1.html].

[https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Particl-Testnet-Getting-Started-d9yhExvCaW6vCp3qLUwuW]
Particl Testnet #6 - 10th Aug 2017 Start Time : 14:30 UTC Purpose The purpose
of
this testnet is to get feedback on the…

paper.dropbox.com

> Remember to start daemon with `-testnet`
• What is “Conditional Staking?”
Particl team member Shazzy (dasource) summarized nicely the security and
value-add this new feature brings to stakeholders on the project.

Thanks for helping!

Particl Team
